content.rendered:
2024 Summer Games in Paris Travel Package Rates

The rates below are based on a travel package including six nights in your choice of first class accommodations, round-trip airport transfers, personalized meet-and-greet upon arrival in Paris, daily breakfast, your preferred event day experiences, 24/7 onsite host services and more. However, you can completely customize your package to make it perfect for you.

Hotel PackageRoom TypePackages From
Renaissance RépubliqueBobo Room$9,825
Marriott Champs ÉlyséesSuperior Room$10,995
Marriott Champs ÉlyséesJunior Suite$12,865
Marriott Champs ÉlyséesSuitesCall for Rates
Le Bristol ParisDeluxe RoomCall for Rates
Shangri-La ParisSuperior Room$16,495
Shangri-La ParisSuitesCall for Rates
Hôtel de CrillonDeluxe Room$17,635
Hôtel de CrillonSuitesCall for Rates
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 25% deposit is due at time of booking to secure your package. The second 25% deposit is due November 1, 2022. The third 25% deposit is due October 1, 2023. The Final balance is due February 1, 2024.
